TopicTitle: I'm King of the Mun! lol

Articles.Content:
Landed on top of the Arch LOL.

I also brought along surface level cameras. This flight was extremely research based. I deployed a Kerbal dummy, took the first surface level photography of the Mun (for research to plan the best approach to future EVAs), landed on top of the Mun Arch and observed many of my other craft soaring over head.
PLEASE give me the name of that mod.
did you actually see any of your other rockets? If so, did you take any screenshots of them?

did you actually see any of your other rockets? If so, did you take any screenshots of them?

I cleared my persistence file pretty soon before this if I remember correctly. I was the only thing there.

PLEASE give me the name of that mod.

It\'s GoDammit\'s Kerpollo pack. Unfortunately no longer on the forums.
Is the Munar Lander your ship you used to get there or an easter egg?

Is the Munar Lander your ship you used to get there or an easter egg?

Oh, THE ARCH IS THAT BIG!??!?! I had no idea, i thought it was very small :-X

Is the Munar Lander your ship you used to get there or an easter egg?

It is my Munar Lander. I performed a targeted landing and touched down on the arch.

Oh, THE ARCH IS THAT BIG!??!?! I had no idea, i thought it was very small :-X

Yeah, they look small when it\'s just a picture of the arch. That\'s because there\'s no reference to see how big it really is, but when you land on it, you are totally astonished at the size. I measure the height at about 158 meters from the ground to the top of the Arch.

For reference, that\'s quite a bit taller than the launch tower at Kerbal Space Center.
I saw one of the arches from munar orbit once...
